sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select v-model="modelValu" @change="changeOption">
        <option disabled value="">Выберите список</option>
        <option 
            v-for="option in options"
            :value="option.value"
            :key="option.value"
        >
            {{ option.name }}
        </option>
    </select>
</template>
<script>

export default {
    name: 'my-select',
    props: {
        modelValu: {
            type: String,
        },
        options: {
            type: Array,
            default: () => [],
        }
    },
    methods: {
        changeOption(event) {
            this.$emit('update:modelValue',event.target.value)
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
    
</style>
